resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104506</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104506</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205936</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">BRUSHster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">BRUSHster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">BRUSHster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">BRUSHster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">BRUSHster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">BRUSHster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">BRUSHster</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">lets you paint on the web. More than 40 brushes and textures are offered with a full palette of colors and effects that blur, ripple, and fragment your designs. Click auto to see the computer generate screen designs.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">läßt Sie auf dem Web malen. Mehr als 40 
Bürsten und Beschaffenheiten werden mit einer vollen Palette der 
Farben und der Effekte angeboten, die Ihre Designs verwischen, 
plätschern und zersplittern. Klickenautomobil, zum des 
Computers zu sehen, Bildschirmdesigns festzulegen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vous laisse peindre sur le Web. Plus de 40 
brosses et textures sont offertes avec une pleine palette de couleurs 
et des effets qui brouillent, ondulent, et réduisent vos conceptions.
Automobile de clic pour voir l'ordinateur produire des 
conceptions d'écran.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deixa-o pintar no Web. Mais de 40 escovas e 
texturas são oferecidas com um palette cheio das cores e dos efeitos 
que borram, ripple, e fragmentam seus projetos. Automóvel do 
clique para ver o computador gerar projetos da tela.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">li lascia verniciare sul Web. Più di 40 
spazzole e strutture sono offerte con una gamma di colori piena dei 
colori e degli effetti che offuscano, si increspano e spezzettano i 
vostri disegni. Automobile di scatto per vedere il calcolatore 
generare i disegni dello schermo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σας αφήνει να χρωματίσετε στον Ιστό. 
Περισσότερες από 40 βούρτσες και συστάσεις προσφέρονται 
με μια πλήρη παλέτα των χρωμάτων και των αποτελεσμάτων ότι 
θαμπάδα, κυμάτωση, και τεμαχίζουν τα σχέδιά σας. Χτυπήστε 
το αυτοκίνητο για να δείτε τον υπολογιστή παράγει τα 
σχέδια οθόνης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">le deja pintar en el Web. Más de 40 
cepillos y texturas se ofrecen con una gama de colores llena de los 
colores y de los efectos que enmascaran, ondulan, y hacen fragmentos 
de sus diseños. Automóvil del tecleo para ver el ordenador 
generar diseños de la pantalla.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205936</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104506</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/brushster</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
